member.name: T:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccess
member.summary: DataAccess is the base class for any classes that require access to a database table. It provides functionality for selecting, updating, inserting, and deleting records from the database.

remarks.para: Put connection strings in web.config file

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccess.ExecuteSqlScalar(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a an sql query that returns an integer as a result. An example would be using the MAX function to get the last instance id.
member.returns: Returns an Integer. If no result can be found, a 0 is returned.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccess.GetDataSet(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a DataSet based on the SELECT sql statement and returns a dataset with the query results.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccess.insertSqlException(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes transactions. Used for multiple insert, update, and delete statements.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccessWS.Find(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calls and returns data from the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccessWS.FindScalar(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a an sql query that returns an integer as a result. An example would be using the MAX function to get the last instance id.
member.returns: Returns an Integer. If no result can be found, a 0 is returned.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccessWS.Update(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates data using the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccessWS.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes data using the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccessWS.Create(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates data using the DataAccess class based on the sql passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataAccessWS.ProcessTransaction(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Processes multiple transactions based on the array passed. It connects to the database using a connection id.

member.name: T:AccessServiceSQL.DataException
member.summary: DESE Specific Exception Class to be used for handling Errors that occur when accessing the database. This class will allow the SQL statement that caused the error to be accessed and displayed from the calling application and allow data access errors to be handled in specific manner.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.DataException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructer used to create an instance of a DataException. All parameters must be passed.

member.name: P:AccessServiceSQL.DataException.sql
member.summary: Gets the sql statement that was attempted when the exception occurred.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.SQLMethods.Delete(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes data based on the sql that is passed.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.SQLMethods.Create(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates records based on the sql that is passed.

member.name: M:AccessServiceSQL.SQLMethods.ProcessTransaction(System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Processes transactions based on the array passed in.
